network_overview: The capture shows healthy 5G N4 (PFCP), 4G Diameter, 3G GTP-C and AAA RADIUS control-plane traffic between SMF/UPF, MME/HSS and SGSN/CGF. All observed transactions complete successfully; no user-plane or IMS traffic is present at this observation point.

observations.finding: PFCP Session-Establishment requests (Msg-50) always receive accepted answers (Msg-51) with cause=1
PFCP Session-Modification requests (Msg-52) are always answered successfully (Msg-53) with cause=1
One Diameter Cmd-272 exchange returns 3002 'Unable-to-Deliver' but is immediately retried and succeeds (2001)
observations.evidence: pkt_2→pkt_3 (3002) followed by pkt_4→pkt_5 (2001) within 22 ms

inconclusive_aspects.reason: GTP-U or 5G-PDU session data not captured at this UPF control interface
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Mirror the N3/N9 user-plane ports to verify PDU session throughput

inconclusive_aspects.reason: No SIP, RTP, or NGAP observed
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Capture on IMS-core or N2 interface for call signalling and media

inconclusive_aspects.reason: Only Diameter result codes visible; no NAS/ESM messages
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Trace S1-MME or N1 interface to confirm UE attach accept

recommendations.action: Monitor the single Diameter 3002 occurrence for recurrence; if repetitive, investigate peer 10.47.54.22 reachability
recommendations.rationale: One transient timeout is acceptable, but repetition would indicate transport or peer overload

recommendations.action: Enable GTP-U/PDU counters on UPF to correlate with PFCP session-create/modify rates
recommendations.rationale: Ensures successful control-plane transactions actually carry user traffic

session_analysis.signaling_health: All PFCP, Diameter, GTP-C and RADIUS exchanges complete successfully; no retransmissions or reject codes observed after initial 3002 retry.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: Not observable at this capture point (N4 control interface only).
session_analysis.voice_quality: Not observable (no RTP or SIP present).
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: PFCP session-create/modify success implies SMF-UPF sync is healthy; Diameter success indicates HSS/PCRF reachability.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant SMF
    participant UPF
    participant MME
    participant HSS
    Note over SMF,UPF: 5G N4 PFCP
    SMF->>UPF: PFCP Session Establish (50) seq=814444
    UPF->>SMF: PFCP Response (51) cause=1
    SMF->>UPF: PFCP Modify (52) seq=814940
    UPF->>SMF: PFCP Response (53) cause=1
    Note over MME,HSS: 4G S6a Diameter
    MME->>HSS: Cmd-272 session=mscp01...
    HSS->>MME: 3002 Unable-to-Deliver
    MME->>HSS: Cmd-272 (retry)
    HSS->>MME: 2001 Success
